name: Dark Leviathan
description: A massive ancient sea creature corrupted by dark forces. This colossal leviathan commands the deepest trenches of the ocean with its immense power and malevolent presence.

abilities.name: Abyssal Smash
abilities.description: Channels the power of the abyss to unleash a devastating smash that deals 1000 damage to ALL enemies. The sheer force of this attack cannot be dodged or reduced.

abilities.name: Tidal Splash
abilities.description: Moves the water in the cave, splashing water to everyone. Each enemy has a 50% chance to take either 755 damage or 400 damage (ignoring magical shield). Dark Leviathan heals for all damage dealt.

abilities.name: Abyssal Regen
abilities.description: Channels the regenerative power of the abyss, increasing HP regeneration to 425 per turn for 5 turns. The dark waters restore the leviathan's vitality.
